ygData.subject: RE: Evil Smiths?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, since you helped me, I will help you. I am a Kelethin native. Sharpening stones and Ore are in Steamfont, 2nd windmill. Small molds are in Steamfont and
ygData.messageBody:
Well, since you helped me, I will help you. I am a Kelethin native.
Sharpening stones and Ore are in Steamfont, 2nd windmill. Small molds are in
Steamfont and Butcherblock, both are merchants right outside the respective
cities, Ak'anon and Kaladim. You can only get medium molds in Kelethin, so
you have to take a little trip.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: David [SMTP:milamber@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 9:56 AM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Evil Smiths?
>
> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> Their are supplies in Neriak. Some molds are on a couple of ogres (the
> books mainly), and have been told about the guy upstairs in the mushroom
> inn
> sells some also (armor I think I was told) and the guy playing darts in
> the
> blind fish sells sharpening stones plus ore (this I know).
>
> Does anyone know where Sharpening stones are sold in.... forgot the name
> wood elf city, I found the forge but can't find ore or the stone to get
> started. Oh, found the molds off 2 vendors... still trying to get use to
> the
> city and not falling off the edge :)
>
> Tenin
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> To: <eq_blacksmiths@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 9:28 AM
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Evil Smiths?
>
>
> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> I don't know if this has been asked before, but where can I find smithing
> supplies for a Dark Elf? Do I have to go to Grobb or Oggok? or is there
> some
> place close? thanks.
>
>
